“Insert a Generic Happy Birthday Message” Two buttons Choose your shot!
Regular Personal This is the section where you can add your generic wish the normalised one with those normal wishes. Feel free to change the UI and the necessary background pictures to make it more suitable as per your choice.> And here\'s the traditional wish.Enjoy your day blah blah complete it. Be yourself always :)
Greetings ma’am,
[Personalised Name]
This was the section where I had some special references You can fill it whatever relavant it seems to you. The page might seem a bit empty to you but yeah you actually have to come up with something creative Maybe something for the person that would be special It can also be used for other purposes like pictures and stuff by using ImageView and different stuff rather than just textual messages
Feedback [This is the part where you put a worthy ending to the entire message I had a pretty personalised message here so maybe you can try that] Signing Off, [Insert Name] [Date]
